languages.text:
На 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g} создает область 4×4. Противники внутри выполняют {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверку{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафом{/g} −50. В случае провала их {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятие{/g} снижается.
При выходе из области эффекта его действие прекращается. Успешное прохождение проверки дает иммунитет к этому эффекту до конца боя.
languages.original_text:
For 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}, creates a 4×4 area which reduces the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} of every enemy inside it unless they pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −50 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}.
The effect is removed outside that area. A successfully passed {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} grants immunity to this effect until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text:
For 2 rounds, creates a 5×5 area which reduces the Perception of every enemy inside it unless they pass a Willpower resistance test with a −50 penalty.
The effect is removed outside that area. A successfully passed resistance test grants immunity to this effect until the end of combat.

For 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}, creates a 4×4 area which reduces the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} of every enemy inside it unless they pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −50 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}.
The effect is removed outside that area. A successfully passed {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} grants immunity to this effect until the end of combat.

For 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}, creates a 4×4 area which reduces the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} of every enemy inside it unless they pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −50 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}.
The effect is removed outside that area. A successfully passed {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} grants immunity to this effect until the end of combat.

languages.text:
创建一片4×4区域，持续两{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。区域内目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}抗性{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}，且在此次检定中承受−50{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}，未能通过检定的目标{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}会降低。
当目标离开该区域时，感知降低的效果会失效。如果目标成功通过{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，则会对此效果免疫，效果持续至战斗结束。
languages.original_text:
For 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}, creates a 4×4 area which reduces the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} of every enemy inside it unless they pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −50 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}.
The effect is removed outside that area. A successfully passed {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} grants immunity to this effect until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text:
创建一片5×5区域，持续两{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。区域内目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}抗性{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}，且在此次检定中承受-50{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}，未能通过检定的目标{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}会降低。
当目标离开该区域时，感知降低的{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}效果{/g}会失效。如果目标成功通过{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，则会对此效果免疫，效果持续至战斗结束。

创建一片4×4区域，持续两{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。区域内目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}抗性{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}，且在此次检定中承受−50{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}，未能通过检定的目标{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}会降低。
当目标离开该区域时，感知降低的{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}效果{/g}会失效。如果目标成功通过{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，则会对此效果免疫，效果持续至战斗结束。

languages.text:
2{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、4×4のエリアを作り出し、エリア内にいる全ての敵の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g}を下げる。敵は−50の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}で{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}抵抗判定{/g}に成功すれば避けることができる。
その効果はそのエリアの外では解除される。{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に成功すると、戦闘の最後までこの効果への耐性を与える。
languages.original_text:
For 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}, creates a 4×4 area which reduces the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} of every enemy inside it unless they pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −50 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}.
The effect is removed outside that area. A successfully passed {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} grants immunity to this effect until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text:
2{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間5×5のエリアを作り出し、エリア内にいる全ての敵の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}認知力{/g}を下げる。敵は−50の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}で{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}抵抗{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}に成功すれば避けることができる。
その{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}効果{/g}はそのエリアの外では解除される。{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に成功すると、戦闘の最後までこの効果への耐性を与える。

2{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、4×4のエリアを作り出し、エリア内にいる全ての敵の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}認知力{/g}を下げる。敵は−50の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}で{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}抵抗判定{/g}に成功すれば避けることができる。
その{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}効果{/g}はそのエリアの外では解除される。{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に成功すると、戦闘の最後までこの効果への耐性を与える。

languages.text:
Durante 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g}, crea una zona de 4×4 que reduce la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g} de todos los enemigos en su interior a menos que superen una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de fortaleza de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} con una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −50.
El efecto se elimina al abandonar la zona. Superar la {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} otorga inmunidad a este efecto hasta el final del combate.
languages.original_text:
For 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}, creates a 4×4 area which reduces the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} of every enemy inside it unless they pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −50 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}.
The effect is removed outside that area. A successfully passed {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} grants immunity to this effect until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text:
Durante 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g}, crea una zona de 5×5 que reduce la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g} de todos los enemigos en su interior a menos que superen una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de fortaleza de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} con una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −50.
El {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efecto{/g} se elimina al abandonar la zona. Superar la {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} otorga inmunidad a este efecto hasta el final del combate.

languages.text:
Erzeugt 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g} lang einen 4×4-Bereich, der die {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g} jedes Gegners verringert, es sei denn, er besteht eine {g|Encyclopedia:Test}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −50.
Der Effekt wird außerhalb dieses Bereichs entfernt. Eine erfolgreiche {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} macht bis zum Ende des Kampfes immun gegen diesen Effekt.
languages.original_text:
For 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}, creates a 4×4 area which reduces the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} of every enemy inside it unless they pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −50 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}.
The effect is removed outside that area. A successfully passed {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} grants immunity to this effect until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text:
Erzeugt für 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g} einen 5×5-Bereich, der die {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g} jedes Gegners darin verringert, es sei denn, er besteht eine {g|Encyclopedia:Test}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von -50.
Der {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}Effekt{/g} wird außerhalb dieses Bereichs entfernt. Eine erfolgreich bestandene {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} macht bis zum Ende des Kampfes immun gegen diesen Effekt.

languages.text:
Pendant 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}, crée une zone de 4 × 4 permettant de réduire la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} de chaque ennemi qui s'y trouve, sauf s'il réussit un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} de résistance de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g} avec une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de −50.
Cet effet disparaît en dehors de cette zone. Un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} réussi confère une invulnérabilité à cet effet jusqu'à la fin du combat.
languages.original_text:
For 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}, creates a 4×4 area which reduces the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} of every enemy inside it unless they pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −50 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}.
The effect is removed outside that area. A successfully passed {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} grants immunity to this effect until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text:
Pendant 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}, crée une zone de 4 × 4 permettant de réduire la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} de chaque ennemi qui s'y trouve, sauf s'il réussit un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} de résistance de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g} avec une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de −50.
Cet effet disparaît en dehors de cette zone. Un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} réussi confère une invulnérabilité à cet effet jusqu'à la fin du combat.

languages.text:
2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} boyunca kalan 4×4 hücrelik bir alan oluşturur. Bu alanın içindeki düşmanlardan −50 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ceza puanına{/g} sahip bir {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} direnç {g|Encyclopedia:Test}testinden{/g} geçemeyenlerin {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Algı{/g} nitelikleri azalır.
Bu alandan çıkanlarda bu etki ortadan kalkar. {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Direnç testinden{/g} geçenler, bu etkiye karşı bağışıklık kazanırlar ve bu bağışıklık çatışma sonuna dek sürer.

For 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}, creates a 4×4 area which reduces the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} of every enemy inside it unless they pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −50 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}.
The effect is removed outside that area. A successfully passed {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} grants immunity to this effect until the end of combat.
